{R}

p1 \<- ggplot(data, aes(x = Efficiency_nm_per_kWh)) +

geom_histogram(bins=20,

boundary = max(data\$Efficiency_nm_per_kWh),

color="grey25",

fill="purple") +

ggtitle("Distribution of Fuel Efficiency (nm per kWh)")

print(p1)

### 1.3.3 Boxplots of Operational Cost by Ship Type

```{R}
ggplot(data, aes(x=Ship_Type, y=Operational_Cost_USD, fill=Ship_Type)) +
  geom_boxplot(alpha=0.7) +
  theme_minimal() +
  ggtitle("Operational Cost Distribution by Ship Type") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle=45, hjust=1))

```

```{R}
ship_cor <- cor(data[, c("Speed_Over_Ground_knots", "Engine_Power_kW", "Distance_Traveled_nm", 
                         "Draft_meters", "Cargo_Weight_tons", "Operational_Cost_USD", 
                         "Revenue_per_Voyage_USD", "Turnaround_Time_hours","Efficiency_nm_per_kWh", 
                         "Seasonal_Impact_Score", "Weekly_Voyage_Count", "Average_Load_Percentage")])

corrplot(ship_cor)


```

```{R}
ggplot(data, aes(x = Weather_Condition, 
                 y = Efficiency_nm_per_kWh)) +
  stat_halfeye(adjust = 0.5,
               justification = -0.2,
               .width = 0,
               point_colour = NA) +
  geom_boxplot(width = .20,
               outlier.shape = NA)

```
